## 예제1

```{r}
sqrt(2)
exp(5)
log10(20)
log(20)
gamma(5)
abs(-4.5)
round(pi, 2)
```

## 예제 2

```{r}
dnorm(5, mean = 5, sd = 1)
dexp(1, rate = 5)
dweibull(50, 80, scale = 1.5)
```
##예제 3

```{r}
A <- 5
B <- 6
2*A + B^2
A^5*3^B
rm(list = ls())
```
